Player History
Earned first career win on 4/7/1985...
Had first career hit on 4/14/1985, off Ron Robinson (CIN)...

2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,685,714 through salary arbitration...
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1986...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,685,714 through salary arbitration...

2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,685,714 through salary arbitration...

2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,685,714 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/21/1990 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 6 weeks...
Released by Oakland on 10/12/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/10/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $2,420,000 per year...
